fr_FR.description: Ce mod propose diverses améliorations des sorts par Graion Dilach pour les jeux sur l'Infinity Engine.

en_US.description: This mod features various spell enhancements by Graion Dilach for games on the Infinity Engine.

components.100: Add back Spell Immunity against Spell Revisions [ClassSpellTool]
components.115: Add back vanilla True Sight as a level higher spell against Spell Revisions [ClassSpellTool]
components.120: Maximize Cure Wounds' effect in Spell Revisions
components.125: Install Spell Revisions standard Conjure Water Elemental when IWD spells from IWDification/SCS are installed
components.131: Restore older functionality to Slow Poison so that it cures poison instead of slowing it down

zh_CN.description: 此模组为无限引擎游戏提供了由 Graion Dilach 制作的多种法术改进。
